WE SEE WHAT YOU MISS.

Advanced Pattern Recognition Protocol

THE FOLLOW LIST

We cross-reference his following list with known OF models, influencers, and local 'baddies'.

THE LIKER BOT

Analyzes his like history to find patterns. Does he like every bikini pic? We'll know.

GHOST FOLLOWERS

Identifies accounts that he follows but don't follow back. High suspicion rating.

TIME STAMPS

Correlates his 'Goodnight' texts with his actual activity status on other apps.

DM SLIDE DETECTOR

Scans for common pickup lines and emoji usage patterns in recovered messages.

LOCATION MISMATCH

Verifies if his tagged locations match where he said he was.
